Autonomous agents. Compose, deploy, and orchestrate specialized AI agents, each focused on a specific task, to execute real CX work. Instant scalability. Add agents, reuse skills, and coordinate how they operate across the customer journey, without rebuilding workflows or adding complexity. Intent-driven execution. Define goals, policies, and constraints while AI agents execute tasks and learn from real interactions and outcomes. USE CASES Real CX work, automated by AI agents. Appointments and directions Confirm, update, and coordinate appointment details and directions in one flow. Order status and tracking Provide end-to-end order visibility and delivery resolution with real-time updates. Proactive travel notifications Anticipate and notify customers of disruptions, policy changes and service updates. Card status and authorization Verify, update, and manage card details and payment authorizations in real time. The most reliable AI agents in CX. AI agents that act with domain-aware context, built-in validation, and continuous learning. DATA CLOUD Industry-specific AI agents Apply pre-trained agents for specific industries, use cases, and regulatory environments, so decisions reflect real-world knowledge and constraints. Dynamic knowledge creation Improve AI agents’ decisions over time by continuously creating and refining knowledge from live interactions and enterprise data. Quality as a built-in control layer Enforce reliability by validating behavior, decisions, and outcomes in real time, ensuring execution remains accurate and controlled as volume scales. VOICE IN ACTION Natural conversations, real outcomes. Let customers speak naturally while AI agents reason through requests, apply real-time context, and deliver accurate outcomes, so issues are resolved, not just answered. Don't take our word for it. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Emily and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their customer experience automation. I came across your company, Talkdesk, and was impressed with the work you're doing in the contact center software space. Can you tell me a little bit about your current data processing setup?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, yes. We're currently using a combination of in-house solutions and some third-party tools to manage our data processing. It's been working for us so far, but I'm always open to learning about new solutions. What makes DeepData AI unique?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Well, our platform uses AI agents to orchestrate the entire customer journey, providing instant scalability and intent-driven execution. We've seen significant improvements in efficiency and customer satisfaction with our existing clients. I'd love to schedule a demo to show you how it works.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure if we're in the market for a new solution right now. We've invested heavily in our current setup and I'm not convinced that switching would be worth the cost and integration headaches. Plus, I've heard similar pitches from your competitors, such as IBM and Microsoft. What sets you apart from them?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your concerns, but our solution is highly customizable and can integrate with your existing infrastructure. We've also had success with companies in the contact center software space, and I think we could bring significant value to your business. In terms of competitors, our AI agents are more advanced and can handle complex tasks with greater accuracy.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm still not convinced. Our current solution is working well for us, and I'm not sure if the benefits of switching would outweigh the costs. We're also in the middle of a major project right now, and I don't think we have the bandwidth to take on a new implementation. Can you tell me more about your pricing model and what kind of support you offer?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing is based on the number of AI agents you deploy, and we offer tiered pricing to fit different business needs. We also provide 24/7 support and dedicated account management to ensure a smooth onboarding process. I'd be happy to provide a customized quote and answer any further questions you may have.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Thank you for the information, Emily, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. We're happy with our current solution and don't see a compelling reason to switch. I appreciate your time and effort, but I don't think this is a good fit for us at this time.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Integration
Feedback: The seller should have provided more specific examples or case studies to address the buyer's concerns about integration and the value proposition of switching from their current solution. Sentiment: Neutral
